page.title: 02BANKING IN THE AREA
page.content:
{
INTERVEIW WITH THE MANAGER OF THE BANK} THE MANAGERS JOB: HE LENDS MONEY TO PEOPLE,LOANS,OVERDRAFTS ETC.THE AREA IS AVERAGE MONEYWISE.MOST WAGES ARE AVERAGE.NOT MANY PEOPLE GO BANKRUPT IN THE AREA.THE BANK USUALLY WRITES OFF 0-10 ACCOUNTS THAT GO BANKRUPT.20% OF HOME MORTGAGES RELATE TO FIRST TIME BUYERS.THE MANAGER OF OUR LOCAL BRANCH THOUGHT BANKS WILL HAVE VERY HIGH TECHNOLOGY.MOST STAFF WILL DISAPPEAR AND QUITE A FEW ROBOT TILLS WILL COME I TO ACTION.COMPUTERS WILL COME INTO HELP WITH ACCOUNTING AND DEALING WITH LARGE SUMS OF MONEY IN ITS MEMORY.A LARGE NUMBER OF OFFICES WILL BE COMPUTERISED IN THE FUTURE.By Graeme Binnie
